TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManipulationDeltaEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ManipulationDeltaEventArgs Inherits InputEventArgs
public ref class ManipulationDeltaEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::Input::InputEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含有关操作的位置中的更改的数据。The class contains data about changes in the position of a manipulation. 属性包含自上一个发生的更改发生事件。The property contains the changes that occurred since the last event occurred. 属性包含所发生的当前操作的总更改。The property contains the total changes that occurred for the current manipulation. 你可以使用其中一个属性可以转换操作的对象。You use one of those properties to transform the manipulated object. 您可以通过调用结束操作方法或强制进行惯性通过调用操作方法。You can end a manipulation by calling the method or force the manipulation into inertia by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例使用属性用于移动、 调整大小，请和旋转。The example uses the property to move, resize, and rotate a . 该示例还将检查是否惯性和矩形是否处理窗口的边缘期间发生的事件。The example also checks whether the event occurred during inertia and whether the rectangle is touching the edge of a window. 如果这种情况下都为真，应用程序将停止操作后，若要防止将应用程序的可见区域的矩形。If those cases are true, the application stops the manipulation to prevent the rectangle from leaving the visible area of the application. 此示例摘自在更大的示例[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationdelta)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationdelta)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Cancel() cil managed

span.span: Cancels the manipulation.

returns.span: 如果成功取消操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the manipulation was successfully canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果方法成功，则默认把以前触控事件做为鼠标或鼠标移动事件的元素且不发生未来操作事件。If the method succeeds, the default sends previous touch events as mouse down or mouse move events to the element and future manipulation events do not occur. 触摸不能提升为鼠标事件，如果在惯性期间发生的事件。Touch cannot be promoted to mouse events if the event occurs during inertia.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Complete() cil managed

summary.span: 完成操作而不发生惯性。

span.span: Completes the manipulation without inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以调用方法来结束操作。You can call the method to end the manipulation. 例如，当对象达到窗口的边缘，你可以调用以阻止对象转出屏幕。For example, when an object reaches the edge of a window, you can call to prevent the object from going off the screen. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例检查是否惯性和矩形是否处理窗口的边缘期间发生的事件。The example checks whether the event occurred during inertia and whether the rectangle is touching the edge of a window. 如果这种情况下都为真，应用程序将停止操作后，若要防止将应用程序的可见区域的矩形。If those cases are true, the application stops the manipulation to prevent the rectangle from leaving the visible area of the application. 此示例摘自在更大的示例[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationdelta)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationDelta](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationdelta)]

Public ReadOnly Property IsInertial As Boolean
public: property bool IsInertial { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 事件是否在惯性期间发生。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the event occurs during inertia.

value.span: 如果在惯性运动期间发生 事件，则为 ；如果在用户接触 过程中发生该事件，则为 。

span.span: if the event occurs during inertia; if the event occurs while the user has contact with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此方法以确定是否事件发生惯性期间或在用户已获得的元素与联系事件。You can use this method to determine whether the event occurs during inertia or while the user has contact with the element that receives the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 该示例检查是否惯性和矩形是否处理窗口的边缘期间发生的事件。The example checks whether the event occurred during inertia and whether the rectangle is touching the edge of a window. 如果这种情况下都为真，应用程序将停止操作后，若要防止将应用程序的可见区域的矩形。If those cases are true, the application stops the manipulation to prevent the rectangle from leaving the visible area of the application. 此示例摘自在更大的示例[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReportBoundaryFeedback(class System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta unusedManipulation) cil managed

param.name: unusedManipulation
param.span: 表示移动出边界的操作部分。

span.span: The portion of the manipulation that represents moving beyond the boundary.

summary.span: 指明该操作已经超出了一定界限。

span.span: Specifies that the manipulation has gone beyond certain boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以指示元素已移出某些边界。Use the method to indicate that an element has moved beyond a certain boundary. 例如，如果用户移动的元素的边界之外，你可以调用此方法以报告到窗口。For example, if a user moves an element outside of the bounds of a , you can call this method to report that to the window. 当调用、事件发生。When you call , the event occurs. 默认情况下，订阅事件，以便向已达到边界的用户提供可视反馈。By default, the subscribes to the event to provide visual feedback to the user that a boundary has been reached. 你可以订阅来实现自定义行为。You can subscribe to to implement custom behavior. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序调用的事件当用户在其容器的边缘上移动元素的方法。The following example shows an event handler for the event that calls the method when the user moves the element over the edge of its container. 若要测试此示例中，按照中的步骤[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)和在步骤 5 中的代码替换此代码。To test this example, follow the steps in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md) and replace the code in step 5 with this code. [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ReportBoundaryFeedback](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/reportboundaryfeedbackexample.xaml.cs#reportboundaryfeedback)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ReportBoundaryFeedback](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/reportboundaryfeedbackexample.xaml.vb#reportboundaryfeedback)]

span.span: is .

summary.span: 通过忽略后来的接触运动并引发 事件对操作启动惯性。
